state.message: Sorry we're currently closed but we will be open next Sunday from 12 - 5PM and Monday from 7 - 10PM. Check us out on Facebook.
state.preMessage: In memory of Nicholas Lordi, who passed away on Nov 4th. Nick was a supporter of the Information Age Learning Center (InfoAge) and and the IXR/CDL makerspace. A viewing on Saturday, November 12, 2022 from 2pm - 5pm at O’Brien Funeral Home, 2028 Hwy 35 at New Bedford Rd., Wall Twp. His family asks that if you are so moved, you make a donation to support the expanded Makerspace program at InfoAge..
state.postMessage: To get current updates subscribe to our CDL Mail list or cdl+subscribe@groups.io.
state.blogUpdate: (Title: Makerspace near me ... Can't find CDL - Updated: Oct. 05, 2022)
